question: Are female relatives aloud to talk to their nonmahram relatives whilst they are in complete purda just to keep unity among the family?
answer:
QUESTION
Are female relatives aloud to talk to their nonmahram relatives whilst they are in Respected mufti sahib complete purda just to keep unity among the family? If they make Salams to you are we allowed to answer?
ANSWER


Share:
It is not permissible to talk to non-Mahram family members.

Indeed maintaining unity is an important injunction of Shari?ah as well, however, that is without violating other laws of Allah. If male family members make salaam, you may reply to the salaam softly.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
